titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the East India trade being a most profitable trade to the kingdom, and best secured and improved by a company and a joint-stock / wrote at the instance of Thomas Papillon, Esq. and in his house, and printed in the year 1680 ; and now reprinted for the better satisfaction of himself and others.
titleStmt.author: Papillon, Thomas, 1623-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
